alert.note: Alert for Lonoke (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 10:14AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Lonoke, northwestern Jefferson and southeastern Pulaski Counties through 1045 AM CDT... At 1014 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pine Bluff Arsenal, or 13 miles northwest of Pine Bluff, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... White Hall... England... Humnoke... Keo... Pine Bluff Arsenal... Hensley Island... Allport... Coy... Sherrill... Tucker... Pastoria... Wright... Tomberlin... Lock and Dam 5 Park... Kearney... Tar Camp Park... Dexter... Seaton... Blakemore... Gethsemane... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CDT for central Arkansas. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 400 PM CDT for central and southeastern Arkansas.
